attributes.action: Grandparents as parents petion for  new allowance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned are appealing to the government. To ask that all 
grandparents who are bringing up their grandchildren should have equal 
standing, rights,and allowances similar to foster carers to provide a decent 
living for the grandchildren, and that these allowances are the same all 
over the UK. These grandparents should also have a proper care package in 
place as soon as the child or children are placed with them. With a grant 
payable on the arrival of the child or children to cover their emergency 
needs, and access to a free residency order if needed.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
